about_the_game:
Tamns wagons are used to transport moisture-sensitive loose materials such as plaster, salt or coke and to move heavy freight such as metal loads. The wagons feature a cover which can be rolled along the wagon top to keep rain off the load. All vehicles use programmed train back plates at each end of the wagon.

The wagons in this pack feature the virtualRailroads RandomSkin system. When placing the wagons in scenarios, RandomSkin automatically and randomly selects one of four livery variations to give your consists a realistic unsorted appearance.

The wagons in this pack feature the virtualRailroads RandomSkin system. When placing the wagons in scenarios, RandomSkin automatically and randomly selects one of four livery variations to give your consists a realistic unsorted appearance.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows® 7 / 8.1
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Core 2 Duo (3.2 GHz Core 2 Duo recommended), AMD Athlon MP (multiprocessor variant or comparable processors)
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:512 MB - 1GB with Pixel Shader 3.0 (AGP PCIe only)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:40 GB HD space
  • Sound:Direct X 9.0c compatible
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional:Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos
  • Graphics:Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required
